ing: 1 (1 ounce) envelope instant hot chocolate mix
des: "This is your basic cup of hot chocolate, but with a kick! Everyone has their own way of making hot chocolate - do that, then just add a bit of butterscotch schnapps. Top with whipped cream if desired."
ins: In a mug, dissolve instant chocolate mix with hot milk. Stir in butterscotch schnapps.
